text: phir tum vahee ho ki apane logon kee hatya karate ho aur apane hee ek giroh ke logon ko unakee bastiyon se nikaalate ho; tum gunaah aur zyaadatee ke saath unake viruddh ek-doosare ke prshthaposhak ban jaate ho; aur yadi ve bandee banakar tumhaare paas aate hai, to unakee rihaee ke lie phide (arthadand) ka len-den karate ho jabaki unako unake gharon se nikaalana hee tum par haraam tha, to kya tum kitaab ke ek hisse ko maanate ho aur ek ko nahin maanate? phir tumamen jo aisa karen usaka badala isake siva aur kya ho sakata hai ki saansaarik jeevan mein apamaan ho? aur qayaamat ke din aise logon ko kathor se kathor yaatana kee or pher diya jaega. allaah usase bekhabar nahin hai jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho
